review_details: Ate here 4 or 5 times during our 2 week stay and always found the food excellent. The sevice from Vangelis and crew was second to none. Can't wait to be back again.
This is one of our favourite tavernas in Katelios Great sevice, great food ,great view what more can you say. Oh great value too. See you again

The Aligis studios are the best we have stayed in on many trips to Greece. These studios are perfect, even a bath! Chris and Christhia (sorry not sure if that is the correct spelling) are the most welcoming hosts. This was our best holiday ever and hope to be back next year

From the start Efi and Dimitri made us feel like we had always been onboard. We swam in crystal clear waters, helped to bring in the fish ( Snapper, Bream, Mullett, Scorpion and Parrot Fish ) which we later ate, with the most delicious salad and wine. Barracuda was my favourite, which I may have kissed! (optional) from the start to the finish we had lots of fun and learnt alot. Thanks to all our crew members and Efi and Dimitri Will see you again.
Mixture of Asian and Greek dishes. we went Greek all food excellent with nice touches. Friendly and relaxed atmosphere and very friendly people will definitely be returning
